review: Now I have a smart tv! Love it
author: A.

review: This is everything I had hoped for.
author: Unit 3K21

review: One of the best purchases you could make for streaming Netflix if you have a usb port on your non smart tv! It connects faster than my other smart tv with built in apps! I use my telephone to get the streaming started and then the dongle takes over! Even if I turn my phone off the movie keeps playing! Love it!
author: John R. Chambers

review: this product came in handy a lot over the last few months i am a collage student and recommend this to any other ones as this is handy only thing i wish is that it had a 4g option for phones instead of depending on wifi
author: nigel

review: This was a life saver for my husband and I! Works great and we haven't had any issues at all.
author: JulieBEE
